name: proyector-movil
description: Desktop application that emit images to a client in the same local network

scripts.build:win:32: electron-packager ./ --platform=win32 --arch=ia32  --icon=./favicon.ico --out=./dist --overwrite --app-copyright="Copyright © 2019 Cristian Tomas Torres" --win32metadata.CompanyName="Cristian Tomas Torres" --win32metadata.ProductName="Proyector Móvil" --win32metadata.FileDescription="Desktop application that emit images to a client in the same local network"
scripts.build:win:64: electron-packager ./ --platform=win32 --arch=x64   --icon=./favicon.ico --out=./dist --overwrite --app-copyright="Copyright © 2019 Cristian Tomas Torres" --win32metadata.CompanyName="Cristian Tomas Torres" --win32metadata.ProductName="Proyector Móvil" --win32metadata.FileDescription="Desktop application that emit images to a client in the same local network"
scripts.postinstall: npm run submodules:update && npm run submodules:checkout-master && npm run submodules:install && npm run submodules:build
scripts.submodules:checkout-master: git submodule foreach --recursive git checkout master
scripts.submodules:build: git submodule foreach --recursive npm run build

author: Cristian Tomas Torres <cristiantomastorres@gmail.com>
